originalText.text: They are very unprofessional !! Rude is a understatement..

originalText.text:
Monday, March 26, 2018

This is the BEST place to play your Lottery numbers!  Wendy's employees always provide very fast, very accurate and very efficient service, and there are always plenty of blank playing cards easily available.   While other businesses in the area have come and gone, Wendy's has been here since the 1990's, and will be here for as long as they like, because they're in constant demand and have a consistently steady flow of customers.
The customer area of this store is almost never empty.
Whenever I am  feeling like enjoying Hennessey Cognac, I am sure that I will soon be on my way to Wendy's!                  Maximum   *S**T**A**R**S*.

originalText.text: It's liquor store in a not so great neighborhood with people who have lived in that area for a long time (so they are comfort and careless). If you ask the employees about a type of wine or liquor they are quick to help. Almost every liquor store in Harlem has the same layout when it comes to plexiglass.

originalText.text: This place likes to always ask for ID as if i haven't produced it a thousand times and as for the alcohol they have a very standard selection with pretty much nothing extra and there prices are above average around the neighborhood. they do have an ok wine selection though.
